name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The business identifier for the instance: claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number.

name: $addidentifier
desc: The business identifier for the instance: claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The business identifier for the instance: claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The category of claim, eg, oral, pharmacy, vision, insitutional, professional.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The category of claim, eg, oral, pharmacy, vision, insitutional, professional.

name: $subType
desc: Returns: A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType.

name: $addsubType
desc: A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType.

name: $use
desc: Returns: Complete (Bill or Claim), Proposed (Pre-Authorization), Exploratory (Pre-determination).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Complete (Bill or Claim), Proposed (Pre-Authorization), Exploratory (Pre-determination).

name: $patient
desc: Returns: Patient Resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Patient Resource.

name: $billablePeriod
desc: Returns: The billable period for which charges are being submitted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The billable period for which charges are being submitted.

name: $created
desc: Returns: The date when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

name: $enterer
desc: Returns: Person who created the invoice/claim/pre-determination or pre-authorization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Person who created the invoice/claim/pre-determination or pre-authorization.

name: $insurer
desc: Returns: The Insurer who is target of the request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Insurer who is target of the request.

name: $provider
desc: Returns: The provider which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

name: $organization
desc: Returns: The organization which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The organization which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Immediate (STAT), best effort (NORMAL), deferred (DEFER).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Immediate (STAT), best effort (NORMAL), deferred (DEFER).

name: $fundsReserve
desc: Returns: In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates no funds reserving is requested.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates

name: $related
desc: Returns: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services.

name: $addrelated
desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services.

name: $prescription
desc: Returns: Prescription to support the dispensing of Pharmacy or Vision products.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Prescription to support the dispensing of Pharmacy or Vision products.

name: $originalPrescription
desc: Returns: Original prescription which has been superceded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products. For example, a physician may prescribe a medication which the pharmacy determines is contraindicated, or for which the patient has an intolerance, and therefor issues a new precription for an alternate medication which has the same theraputic intent. The prescription from the pharmacy becomes the 'prescription' and that from the physician becomes the 'original prescription'.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Original prescription which has been superceded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products. For example, a physician may prescribe a medication which the pharmacy determines is contraindicated, or for whic

name: $payee
desc: Returns: The party to be reimbursed for the services.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party to be reimbursed for the services.

name: $referral
desc: Returns: The referral resource which lists the date, practitioner, reason and other supporting information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The referral resource which lists the date, practitioner, reason and other supporting information.

name: $facility
desc: Returns: Facility where the services were provided.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Facility where the services were provided.

name: $careTeam
desc: Returns: The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications.

name: $addcareTeam
desc: The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications.

name: $information
desc: Returns: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required.

name: $addinformation
desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required.

name: $diagnosis
desc: Returns: List of patient diagnosis for which care is sought.

name: $adddiagnosis
desc: List of patient diagnosis for which care is sought.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: List of patient diagnosis for which care is sought.

name: $procedure
desc: Returns: Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication.

name: $addprocedure
desc: Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication.

name: $insurance
desc: Returns: Financial instrument by which payment information for health care.

name: $addinsurance
desc: Financial instrument by which payment information for health care.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Financial instrument by which payment information for health care.

name: $accident
desc: Returns: An accident which resulted in the need for healthcare services.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An accident which resulted in the need for healthcare services.

name: $employmentImpacted
desc: Returns: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s).

name: $hospitalization
desc: Returns: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center.

name: $item
desc: Returns: First tier of goods and services.

name: $additem
desc: First tier of goods and services.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: First tier of goods and services.

name: $total
desc: Returns: The total value of the claim.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The total value of the claim.
